room.title: (Nightshade's) Rifting Forest
room.description: This forest curves wonderfully around iteself in shear mockery of lower dimensions.

room.title: Rifting Forest
room.description: The leafs of several trees appear to be a liquid that changes colors depending on the direction of a brisk wind.

room.title: A Freshly Created Room
room.description: Change the title of this room by typing "redit title <new title>". Enter the description of this room by typing "redit desc <description>".
